Class Fragment_NewIssueA

All Implemented Interfaces:
ComponentCallbacks, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener
public class Fragment_NewIssueA
extends Fragment

A form for writing issue title, description, category, attaching photo, and proceed to localization of the issue (Fragment_NewIssueB)

Author:
Dimitrios Ververidis for the Multimedia Group (http://mklab.iti.gr).
